headline.main: COUNCIL WITNESSES DEBATE TOUGHER ANTI-SMOKING REGULATIONS

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Emphysema reduced Kathryn Kennedy's voice to a barely audible whisper, but it commanded the attention of the audience when she testified yesterday on proposals to limit smoking in New York City.
